mapper.insert: insert into his_marriage( person_id, unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, marriage_childbirth, mense_blood, mense_cycle, mense_regular, menelipsis, last, last_age, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{marriageChildbirth}, #{menseBlood}, #{menseCycle}, #{menseRegular}, #{menelipsis}, #{last}, #{lastAge}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update his_marriage set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, marriage_childbirth = #{marriageChildbirth}, mense_blood = #{menseBlood}, mense_cycle = #{menseCycle}, mense_regular = #{menseRegular}, menelipsis = #{menelipsis}, last = #{last}, last_age = #{lastAge}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
